alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 2:09PM EST until March 06 at 1:51PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Salamonie River below Warren affecting Huntington, Wells, Jay, Wabash and Blackford Counties. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Cass IN, Kosciusko, Wabash and Whitley Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Wells and Adams Counties. Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Marshall, Pulaski, Fulton IN, Kosciusko and Starke Counties. Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting Carroll, Pulaski and White Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters approach businesses and homes on South Mill Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 12.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
